title: Permanent Ward Skin
body: i recently got the "banner of the horse" ward skin in my looting and crafting inventory and i unlocked so i could have it. however, when i went to go check if it was there, it wasnt. what should i do?

replies.body: My banner of the horse ward has gone missing aswell.  I've had it for a long time, just noticed I didn't have it today.

There's an issue right now where some ward skins unlocked on accounts are not selectable.  There's no eta on a fix for this just yet, but I was able to confirm that the Banner of the Horse Ward has been unlocked on the account.  I hope that helps clear things up!

Could you hit this one up? Still needs assistance so I figured I'd toss it to you while you're still at work; http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/7J7ZAR0F-daily-data-corruption?comment=0000000000000000
